img_above_text:
Head right from the Keeper's Shrine and go down the stairs. A cutscene will play as you drop down, and the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast will appear.
## Yaoguai King - Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast
img_below_text:
The fight will begin immediately as the beast launches itself at you. It's extremely agile, and a lot of the fight will be the beast hurtling towards you, trying to take swipes at you. Despite this agility, you'll see familiar moves to other bosses you've encountered in this Chapter so far.
![Bishui Cave Walkthrough \(36\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough_%2836%29.png)

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts a dramatic moment from the Bishui Cave walkthrough in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It showcases the Yaoguai King, Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast, lunging aggressively at the player character in a dark, cavernous setting. The beast's imposing size and ferocity are emphasized, while the player character appears poised for battle, wielding a glowing weapon amidst scattered sparks.

2. **Purpose and Narrative Role**:  
The image visually represents the start of the intense boss fight against the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast, highlighting its agility and ferocity as described in the accompanying text. It serves to immerse players in the atmosphere of the encounter and prepare them for the beast's challenging attacks.
